Source.Name: toxcore
Source.Summary: toxcore is the core library for Tox communication clients.
Source.Description: Tox is a peer to peer (serverless) instant messenger aimed at making security and privacy easy to obtain for regular users. It uses NaCl for its encryption and authentication.
